description:
In this video from the Epic Games Career Connections series, Adrian McLaurin reveals how he found his place as a playtest researcher at Epic Games.

Career Connections is a series by Epic Games Education designed to support emerging talent in creative fields. This collection provides resources and knowledge to help students and new graduates thrive in industries like games, animation, and virtual production. Check it out to gain insights into industry-relevant skills and discover pathways to success.

Learn more about Unreal Engine here: unrealengine.com

author: Unreal Engine
description:
In this video from the Epic Games Career Connections series, Amir Satvat of Tencent Games discusses the current state of the video game industry and shares practical advice for new grads navigating a competitive job market. 

He highlights the importance of accessible tools, project-based learning, and community engagement. He also touches on his own personal initiatives, helping to connect early career starters and industry professionals.

Career Connections is a series by Epic Games Education designed to support emerging talent in creative fields. This collection provides resources and knowledge to help students and new graduates thrive in industries like games, animation, and virtual production. Check it out to gain insights into industry-relevant skills and discover pathways to success.
